meanings.definition: In a tireless or persistent manner
meanings.sent1: She worked unflaggingly on her project until it was perfect.
meanings.sent2: He unflaggingly pursued his dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel unflaggingly searched for its hidden acorn stash.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed unflaggingly towards the sea, never stopping for a break.
meanings.sent5: The little ant unflaggingly carried the heavy crumb back to its nest.

meanings.sent1: The athlete unflaggingly ran the marathon without slowing down.
meanings.sent2: She unflaggingly maintained her focus during the entire exam.
meanings.sent3: The robot vacuum cleaner unflaggingly cleaned every corner of the room.
meanings.sent4: The wind unflaggingly blew through the trees, rustling the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The sun unflaggingly shone down on the field, warming the players.
